Title: Wrath of the Kirin Tor
Description:
I've assembled the pieces of the device you recovered. 

Place it near Khadgar and use it to repel the Primalists! 

We just need to hold out a little longer until Kalecgos arrives.
ObjectivesText: Use the Arcane Blaster to help Khadgar defeat the primalists.
RewardText: I am relieved that the attack was repelled... but it seems we will need to figure out a plan to help Kalecgos in the Azure Archives.
